title: Snyder Situation, Week 6 Preview, Best NBA Bets
description:
Welcome back to (debatable) with hosts Pablo Torre and Domonique Foxworth featuring Mina Kimes! On today's show: What do you make of ESPN's reporting on Dan Snyder? Does it make sense that Patrick Mahomes is an +2.5 underdog at home against the Bills & Josh Allen? Do you agree with Vegas that the Giants should be six-point underdogs at home against the Ravens? Do you expect the Eagles to roll the Cowboys on Sunday night? Plus, we discuss NBA bets including the Clippers being the title favorites, Zion's MVP odds, and predictions for the Lakers and Celtics!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): ESPN's Dan Snyder Story, Why Is Mahomes An Underdog At Home?
